thread.title: Viral Video Of Girl Losing It On Cab Driver Makes ‘Cash Me Outside’ Seem Tame
thread.title_full: Viral Video Of Girl Losing It On Cab Driver Makes ‘Cash Me Outside’ Seem Tame

author: Alexandra Strickler
title: Viral Video Of Girl Losing It On Cab Driver Makes ‘Cash Me Outside’ Seem Tame
text:
Like Us On Facebook Like Us On Facebook 
Just in case the “ Cash Me Outside ” girl Danielle Bregoli didn’t satisfy your daily dose of awfulness, here’s another gem of a human being for ya! 
Nineteen-year-old Tamika Dudley of Brisbane completely freaked out on a cab driver after he got lost driving her to her destination. 
Dudley posted her bratty-ass tirade to Snapchat for her thousands of followers, who no doubt love to hate her. 
She quickly goes batshit crazy after the Black & White Cabs driver apparently told her to get out of the car, as he was unsure of how to get her to where she needed to be. 
Dudley screamed at him: 
I put in the GPS, so follow the GPS. What’s so hard? What’s so fucking hard about following the GPS?! 
As her driver struggled helplessly with the navigation system, Dudley continued to Snapchat the scene with vulgar commentary. At one point, she dramatically looked at her naked wrist and complained that she would be 30 minutes late to her destination. YouTube 
Dudley repeatedly yelled obscenities at the cab driver throughout the entire incident, and toward the end of their encounter, she threatened to fight him. 
This girl obviously sucks, but even I have to admit that I giggled a little when she angrily spelled out, “K-A-M-E-R-U-K-A” for the driver. And, to his credit, she spelled that out WAY too fast for any reasonable human to comprehend. 
Unfortunately, other cab drivers have attested to the fact that incidents like this are fairly common. 
One driver told 7 News : 
I’ve had it before this myself but my experience, you calm the passenger down. 
According to the Daily Mail Australia , a spokesman for Black & White Cabs declined to comment. 
Since her barrage of Snapchats clearly wasn’t terrible enough on its own, after the report aired on the news, Dudley bragged about how the whole debacle led her to amass several thousand more viewers on Snapchat. YouTube 
It’s only a matter of time now until Tamika Dudley becomes a walking, talking meme just like Danielle Bregoli (if she isn’t already one, that is). 
But now, we must decide, who’s worse? Danielle Bregoli or Tamika Dudley? Schlep (Uber Parody) To view this video please enable JavaScript, and considerupgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video
